photoeffects: My Colors Off, Vivid, Neutral, Sepia, Black & White, Positive Film, Lighter Skin, Darker Skin, Vivid Blue, Vivid Green, Vivid Red, Custom Color*
stillimages: Single, Index, Magnification (Approx. 2x-10x), Thumbnails (4-100), Information Display, Histogram, Overexposure Warning, Resume Playback, Red-Eye Correction, i-Contrast, Trimming, Resize, My Colors
erasemodes: Select, Select Range, Select All Images
continuousshooting: Normal: Approx. 1.9 shots/sec. (in P mode), Approx. 4.5 shots/sec. (in High-speed Burst HQ mode)*
movies: Normal Playback, Slow Motion, Skip Backward, Previous Frame, Next Frame, Skip Forward, Resume Playback, Delete Unwanted Portions of a Clip
other: Memory card slot; direct connection to Canon SELPHY Compact Photo Printers, PIXMA Inkjet Photo Printers and PictBridge-compatible printers via camera's USB 2.0 Hi-Speed Cable
exposurecontrolmethod: AE Lock (not available when shooting movies)
jpegcompressionmode: Still Image: Exif 2.3 JPEG, RAW (14 bit, CR2 (Canon Original)) Video: MOV (Image data: H.264; Audio data: Linear PCM (2 channel stereo))
computerinterface: Hi-Speed USB 2.0 (Dedicated connector (female) with unified type of digital, audio and video*1)
whitebalancecontrol: Auto*, Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Flash, Underwater, Custom1, Custom2
lcdmonitor: 3.0-inch TFT color LCD (Vari-angle type with wide-viewing angle)
videoout: Analogue: NTSC or PAL, Digital: HDMI (HDMI mini connector)
storagemedia: SD Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card, SDXC Memory Card
shootingmodes: C1, C2, M, Av, Tv, P, Auto, SCN, Creative Filters, Movie
fileformat: Design rule for Camera File system, DPOF (Version 1.1) compliant
